_sText:
DE_PETRO
=========
Author: Derek Braun
Date: 03/10/2008
Build  Time: 3 weeks
Players: 24

Description:
==========
Terrorists have seized a chemical processing facility in the heart of a industrial complex. They are threatening to destroy the complex and thus putting the entire region in danger of chemical radiation and a subsequent meltdown.  This map utilizes many vantage points that players can use to their advantage, no matter what side, to gain an edge. Good luck!
